nodes.text: Horizon's Razor, also known as Razors, was a swoop gang participating in the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally around 3626 BBY.

The Horizon's Razor was one of the oldest swoop crews by 3626 BBY, with its riders of Horizon's Razor participating in the sport of swoop racing for decades. The Razors didn't have leaders and instead followed whoever was the fastest rider at that time.

The lack of hierarchy caused many problems for the crew with bad behavior and disagreements turning to infighting and occurring commonly. Eventually, the Horizon's Razor created themselves a large debt due to the loss of many risky bets. Despite the issues, the Razors still gathered many faithful fans who were known to help the Razors out of bad situations.

Due to the lack of organized leadership, the Razors' own founder was lost to time. Allegedly, the Horizon's Razor sought to reclaim its former glory by participating in the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally.
